context: <user>  I want a taxi cab for four. <system>  Where to and would you like a shared ride? <user>  Mariscos El Patron and a shared ride is fine. <system>  To confirm then you want a shared ride, cab for 4 to Mariscos El Patron. <user>  Yes that's it. How long will the journey take? <system>  Your cab is booked and will be with you shortly. The journey should be around 13 minutes. <user>  Thanks for your help. <system>  Can I assist you with anything else?<user>  No thanks for everything. <system>
